folder: Troy Ave. & Kings Hwy., Brooklyn, NY
text:
Troy Ave., near King's Highway and westward towards the Flatlands Dutch Reformed Church, whose spire may be seen beyond the trees. Once, a brook, known as Van Mater's Skating Pond ran easterly through the Willow trees seen in the foreground.

1922.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
title: Brooklyn: Troy Ave. - Kings Hwy.
